name: DudeLauncher
description:
Game Created for  The Mini jam 84: Bubbles.

Its a game about Launching your selfs trough the room, hitting switches so the exit will open.  there are 4 Rooms.

Controls

qwerty - movement ( also: azerty and  Arrow keys)

Space - to launch

Esc - to cancle launch

Up- Down - more power/ less power

Left- Right - turning left/ right

BackSpace - to reset Room

Warning:

there is a bug where for some reason it crashes  when reseting a room. And I still don't know how.

So use the Room select in the start to get back where u were.

Thougs:

So I directly tough up of launching the player. And I wanted somthing realy simple cuase I never have been able to finnish a game (let alone a jam). So I tough about a puzzle game and so came the rest.
